snippet: Mufflers may help stifle engine noise, but they amplified Lenny Prince’s creative tendencies and helped him become a sculptor of elaborate figures.
abstract: Corey Kilgannon Character Study column profiles Lenny Prince, muffler mechanic and owner of Half Price Mufflers in Staten Island; Prince welds life-size sculptures of fantasy characters from mufflers and other auto parts, on view at his Lenny's Creations gallery.
lead_paragraph: Mufflers may help stifle engine noise, but they amplified Lenny Prince’s creative tendencies and helped him become a sculptor of elaborate figures.

headline.main: A Staten Island Mechanic Turns Tailpipes Into Artwork
